name: Pharos of Alexandria
description:
Legend has it, that an ancient artifact is hidden at the top of the Pharos of Alexandria. 

You, the fearles archeologist Larry Craft, are the only one who can uncover the secrets of the Lighttower. 

Reacing the top is no easy feat, because you have to overcome the perils within the tower.

Be sure to check out the tutorial under info before you head into the Tower :)

Controls:

Numpad 4,6 or a,d: Move left and right
Numpad 8,2 or w,s: Move up and down (also ladder)
Numpad 8 or w: Place ladder
Numpad 7,1: Place plank to your left (if possible)
Numpad 9,3: Place plank to your right (if possible)
Numpad 5 or space: Confirm and place spring (your only method for jumping)
Numpad 0 or r: Reset
Numpad +,-: Increase/Decrease resolution

Feedback (positive and negative) would be greatly appreciated.

Good luck and have fun on your journey ^^
